target.name: main
target.echo:
run() { echo "\$ ${@}" "${@}" res=$? if [ $res != 0 ]; then echo echo "Failed!" echo exit $res fi }
ROOT=`cd /home/phynix/workspace/TAJO-2068/tajo-cli/..;pwd` echo echo "Current directory `pwd`" echo run rm -rf tajo-cli-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT run mkdir tajo-cli-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT run cd tajo-cli-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT run cp -r /home/phynix/workspace/TAJO-2068/tajo-cli/target/tajo-cli-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT*.jar . echo echo "Tajo Client dist layout available at: /home/phynix/workspace/TAJO-2068/tajo-cli/target/tajo-cli-0.12.0-SNAPSHOT" echo
